name: Gnomad (Lawlalotti, IssacH, BransonMariola, Napstafork, Fracta Mundi)
name_original: Gnomad (Lawlalotti, IssacH, BransonMariola, Napstafork, Fracta Mundi)
description:
Life as a gnome in an overgrown garden is peaceful. The food is plentiful, the neighbors are kind, and the village is peaceful.

That is, until, the Dragon appeared and perched in the nearby forest. Ever since that fateful day, the fiends have been restless.

You are off picking flowers when you hear a roar above you. With nothing but a stick in hand, can you protect the peace?
